title: Speedy Stitcher Needle 3 Pack
description: Includes the following three stainless steel needles for use with the Speedy Stitcher Sewing Awl: #4S - 1 3/4" small straight needle for fine thread (item# SEW130); #8S - 2 1/8" straight diamond-point needle for coarse thread (item# SEW130A); #8C - 2 1/8" curved diamond-point needle, for coarse thread (item# SEW130B).
